title: Global Finance Meeting To Tackle War-Driven Food Insecurity - NPR
content:
1. Global Finance Meeting To Tackle War-Driven Food Insecurity  NPR
  2. Finance heads urged to boost fight against food insecurity  ABC News
  3. Treasury Secretary Yellen, other finance leaders urge to boost fight against global food insecurity  PBS NewsHour
  4. Global finance meeting focuses on war-driven food insecurity  The Associated Press
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Russia and Ukraine produce roughly 14% of the world's wheat supply, according to the United Nations, and the war has resulted in soaring food prices and fears about food security globally.
